attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Build the Studley Bypass as increased road traffic from Redditch created by massive wharehouse building and through traffic from Birmingham is creating a very dangerous situation all along the A435. Traffic recording states "HGV PIAs Gorcott Hill to north end of Alcester By-pass 1990 to October 2004. 393 accidents between 1/1/1990 and October 2004,49 involving HGVs. 762 vehicles involved, of which 57 were HGVs" All statistics from County Council accident record unit. We must have a Bypass before these figures drastically rise!
